data.eml:eml: Revision of the spider genus Jacaena Thorell, 1897, with descriptions of four new species from Thailand (Araneae: Corinnidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dankittipakul, Pakawin, Tavano, Maria, Singtripop, Tippawan (2013): Revision of the spider genus Jacaena Thorell, 1897, with descriptions of four new species from Thailand (Araneae: Corinnidae). Journal of Natural History 47 (23): 1539-1567, DOI: 10.1080/00222933.2012.763059, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:97EFA23C-7537-4156-8EF0-2D38CF889F5B
